info.author: Sebastien Pierre
classifiers: License :: OSI Approved :: GNU General Public License (GPL)
info.description:
Rugg is a hard drive and filesystem harness tool that allows you to test and
benchmark drives and filesystems, by writing simple to complex scenarios that
can mimic the behaviour of real-world applications.
info.name: Rugg
info.summary: Flexible file system and hard drive crash testing
info.html_description: Rugg is a hard drive and filesystem harness tool that allows you to test and benchmark drives and filesystems, by writing simple to complex scenarios that can mimic the behaviour of real-world applications.
